Package dynamo.messages

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ByeMatesMessage
    Message to announce everyone that a leaving operation is started, and to share own Storage
    HelloMatesMessage
    Message responsible for making all the Peers know about the new Peer that has joined the system
    LeaveMessage
    Message useful to give a feedback to the Client that the leaving procedure has completed correctly
    OperationMessage
    Message responsible for managing the writing and reading operations
    PeersListMessage
    Message responsible to ask for and sharing information regarding the already existing Peers in the system
    RecoveryMessage
    Message responsible manage the recovery of a crashed Node
    RequestInitItemsMessage
    Message responsible to ask for and share all the already existing Items that the sender will be responsible for
    StartJoinMessage
    Message that contains the IP address and the number of port of the coordinator that has to manage the joining request
    TimeoutMessage
    Message useful to inform the receiver that the operation it requested has not been successful, due to a timeout
